snippet.title: Rocket Man (Hi Res) ZX81 16K game from Software Farm (1984)
snippet.description:
Rocket Man was programmed by Julian Chappell in 1984 and published by Software Farm

My interview with Julian Chappell over at Flickering Myth - https://www.flickeringmyth.com/2017/03/interview-julian-chappell-of-the-classic-zx81-publishing-house-software-farm/

Rocket Man Spectra Edition - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=maUtdIfMqx8

Rocket Man Chroma Edition - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7qmPTHhNYCE

Rocket Man Spectrum Edition - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YMC-ARDGfec

It's available to download over at http://www.zx81stuff.org.uk/zx81/generated/packages/r/RocketMan.p.zip

You can download a ZX81 emulator here - https://sourceforge.net/projects/eightyone-sinclair-emulator/

Find me here 

Twitter @Villordsutch
Kofi - www.ko-fi.com/villordsutch

#ZX81 #Retrogaming #RocketMan
